remarks: Entries of the identity polynomial matrix over a ring represented with "lifted scalars", deduction form.  (Contributed by AV, 16-Nov-2019.)
statement:
pmat0opsc.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
pmat0opsc.c $e |- C = ( N Mat P ) $.
pmat0opsc.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` P ) $.
pmat0opsc.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
pmat1opsc.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
pmat1ovscd.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
pmat1ovscd.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
pmat1ovscd.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. N ) $.
pmat1ovscd.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. N ) $.
pmat1ovscd.u $e |- U = ( 1r ` C ) $.
pmat1ovscd $p |- ( ph -> ( I U J ) = if ( I = J , ( A ` .1. ) , ( A ` .0. ) ) ) $.
